description.message: Download links on a web page with popular downloaders such as FlashGet, FlashGet Mini, Thunder and Mini Thunder.
description.description: Description of the extension, which appears in the gallery and Chrome extension management UI

tipNolink.message: There are no links on this page
tipNolink.description: Browser action tooltip text when there are no links to download.

tipUnable.message: This is a special page. Unable to use Download Helper on this page.
tipUnable.description: Browser action tooltip text when the current tab is a special page.

noDownloader.message: No downloaders detected. To enable Download All feature, please install FlashGet or Thunder.
noDownloader.description: Browser action tooltip text when no downloader is installed.

noDownloader2.message: FlashGet Mini detected. To enable Download All feature, please install FlashGet or Thundet.
noDownloader2.description: Browser action tooltip text when only FlashGet Mini is installed.

noDownloader3.message: Mini Thunder detected. To enable Download All feature, please install FlashGet or Thunder.
noDownloader3.description: Browser action tooltip text when only Mini Thunder is installed.

noDownloader4.message: FlashGet Mini and Mini Thunder detected. To enable Download All feature, please install FlashGet or Thunder.
noDownloader4.description: Browser action tooltip text when only FlashGet Mini and Mini Thunder are installed.

downloadAllByThunderAndFlashget.description: Browser action tooltip text when both FlashGet and Thunder are installed.

downloadAllByFlashget.description: The 1st menu item in browser action popup.

downloadAllByThunder.description: The 2nd menu item in browser action popup.

mFlashget.description: The 1st menu item in context menu.

mMiniFlashget.description: The 2nd menu item in context menu.

mThunder.description: The 3rd menu item in context menu.

mMiniThunder.description: The 4th menu item in context menu.

mChrome.description: The 5th menu item in context menu.

mCopyLink.description: The 6th menu item in context menu.

mContextMenu.description: The 7th menu item in context menu.

option.description: The 8th menu item in context menu.

flashget.description: The 1st default downloader option, a popular download manager software.

miniFlashget.description: The 2nd default downloader option, the mini version of FlashGet.

thunder.description: The 3rd default downloader option, a popular download manager software in China.

miniThunder.description: The 4th default downloader option, the mini version of Thunder.

disableMenu.message: Disable right-click download menu and use default Chrome context menu

saveAndClose.description: Save & Close button on the option page
